item.title: Starting in Digital? Don't ruin your brand reputation with your 1st social media marketing campaign
item.description: Digital marketing has its benefits mainly that it’s easy to launch a social media campaign without any prior relationship with the victim. I’m more annoyed at the damage young companies do to their brand, reputation and domain-name … at wasted opportunities from legitimate startups who just spam any contacts in one e-mail blast. Last week, I got an email sent to me with someone elses info - yet it was an invite to join their London business network.
